root: ^The knight ghost struggles to regain his bearings — but you don’t give him the chance.
^You strike him, the holy sword stabbing cleanly through him.
^The knight ghost makes a choked sound but he doesn’t look at you—
^No, he’s looking behind you, at Archibald.
^Glory… would have belonged to us both…
^He fades and dissipates into the air.
^In the end, the Knight Ghost doesn’t get the answer to his questions.
